alert.note: Alert for Champaign (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 7:21AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Champaign County through 745 AM CDT... At 720 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Of The Woods, or near Champaign, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Champaign and Thomasboro around 725 AM CDT. Urbana around 730 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include St. Joseph and Sidney. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 between mile markers 237 and 253. Interstate 74 between mile markers 175 and 195. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
